custom-meta.meta-value: All reads from next generation sequencing were deposited in the NCBI SRA database under the accession no. SRP096859. The genome sequences of YF-BJ1, YF-BJ2, YF-BJ3, YF-BJ4, YF-BJ5, YF-FZ2, YF-FZ4, YF-FZ6, and YF-FZ7 were deposited in the NCBI GenBank database under the accession no. MH633684-MH633692.
